content:
While reviewing #22289, I noticed that the wording of our "move message" menu options is not very clear:

Screen-Shot-2022-07-11-at-5.31.43-PM.png

In particular, "change" is not a very specific verb to use, and it's unclear whether "this topic" refers to the old or new (edited) topic name.

What do folks think about changing the wording to something like the following?

  • Move this message and all following messages
  • Move only this message
  • Move all messages in this topic

This is roughly the phrasing we used in https://zulip.com/help/move-content-to-another-topic. The fact that we felt the need to reword each option in the documentation is a clear sign that the options are not described very clearly in the UI. :)
I would also propose reordering the dropdown so that "Move only this message" is first.
Thoughts?
@Julia Bichler FYI; would be good for you to pick this one up once we have a plan. :)
Yeah, the "previous and following" language has bugged me for some time. I think that proposal looks great!

@Alya Abbott I will definitely pick this up, thanks for pinging me.
Is this proposal the definitive plan now or is it still up for discussion?
I think we can wait a day or so for any additional feedback, and go with the proposal above if there are no further comments.

Let's update the help center pages (https://zulip.com/help/move-content-to-another-topic, https://zulip.com/help/move-content-to-another-stream) in the same PR. I think with this change, we can just delete the list of options from the "From the dropdown menu, select which messages to move" step.

One other thing that has felt unintuitive to me is that the dropdown only appears after you pick another topic, and I often have not realized it showed up because at that point I'm already ready to click the button to make things happen. I recognize that's sort of user error, but it's happened to me a few times so I think it could happen to other people. I know there are extra settings for switching streams, but could we show the dropdown as soon as you enter the "move message" interface?

Alya Abbott said:

While reviewing #22289...

Yep, that's what Julia Bichler is working on fixing. :)
Oh yay!!! :)

Alya Abbott said:

What do folks think about changing the wording to something like the following?

  • Move this message and all following messages
  • Move only this message
  • Move all messages in this topic

One small thing is that it'd probably be good to be clear in the first option that it too is only about messages in this topic. (You might be in a stream view or other interleaved view.)

So e.g.

  • Move this and all following messages in this topic
Mm, yeah, sounds good to me.
@Julia Bichler please go ahead and submit a PR when you get a chance.
Please also ping in #zulip-terminal once the final result is determined, since it would be useful to keep this synchronized.
Thanks for flagging that!
Has this change happened? czo appears to have "move..." wording right now.
I'm pretty sure it did! I suspect we just didn't cross-link the issue/PR from here properly.
Yep, was merged in ccbdbe4e3bc816abd5973ebad5c0ef555d25a075.
@Neil Pilgrim (neiljp) sorry that we neglected to notify you!

I was just looking at implementing this for ZT, which will be straightforward and I'll do shortly.

It's after the change, but for me, things that are definitely better with these strings:

  • Same verb at start of each option (depending on Ui, could be a title/caption)
  • Clarification on which messages are affected ('in this topic' vs previously 'to this topic')
  • Simplification ('all messages' vs previously 'also'+'previous and following')

However, I'm stumbling on 'move', since I think it's used inconsistently:

  • A quick scan indicates the help center says we can 'move' some messages to a different topic, or 'move' an entire topic to another stream, but 'rename' an entire topic (only within a stream?)
  • The UI has 'move'-topic in a popup from a topic 3-dot menu, which allows full-topic between- and in-stream moving/renaming.
  • The UI has an 'edit' action for entering the part discussed above, which is both single-message content editing, as well as the 'move' options for the encompassing topic (one/one+later moving and moving all - renaming in the help)

So, I think good follow-ups here would be to:

  • distinguish move+rename: decide whether to use both rename and move as now or differently, in the help/UI; perhaps add 'rename' to the UI, or maybe in the help use rename as a document title for easier lookup but explicitly describe it as a move. Maybe the help would benefit from a 'Reorganizing messages and topics' summary/section for this?
  • distinguish edit content from move/rename topic: shift this dropdown closer to stream/topic and away from content, or otherwise show their association/separation
  • ultimately determine if there's a simpler UI which would allow separation of single-message edit-content from the 1+-message topic edit (I'm guessing this been discussed already?)

Hey, those are good points -- thank you!

We have a proposed set of changes for the three-dot message menu here: #22537, based on the discussion in #design > three-dot message menu . What do you think?

distinguish move+rename: decide whether to use both rename and move as now or differently, in the help/UI; perhaps add 'rename' to the UI,

Should the three-dot topic menu "Move topic" option be renamed to something like "Move or rename topic"? What do folks think?

Yeah, I think switching to "Move or rename topic" would be appropriate; originally, that widget could only move topics to other streams, not rename, and that's probably why we picked that original label.
Cool, would someone be up for putting up a quick PR? I think given that #19886 will be tackled separately later on, this should be an easy change.
Should it be dependent upon having the permissions to move? That is, rename for in-stream only edits, and move-or-rename for those with extra permissions to do so?

Yes, but we currently don't show the option at all if you don't have permissions to move between streams. Starting to show the option when you can't move the topic between streams is #19886, which is currently blocked by #21739.

That suggests that the ZT approach right now should be to move to broadly the same strings for one/later/all, but with "Rename" as the verb instead, since moving is not yet supported.

Not sure if web should adapt those 3 strings dependent upon permissions (and stream text having changed) in addition to adapting the drop-down text.
